title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 3
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

The breakaway held off the peloton on stage 3 of La Vuelta. Rein Taaramäe claimed stage victory as well as the leader's red jersey. Primož Roglič drops to third overall, though he's still ahead of his primary GC rivals.
